Text:
Description:

Just in time for Marvels the Avengers, relive the story that started it all--digitally remastered and recolored in modern style by Jean-Francois Beaulieu (The Wonderdful Wizard of Oz)! Loki hatches a plot against his hated stepbrother Thor, drawing Earth's mightiest heroes into the fray! Reprinting Avengers (1963) #1.
